thiefworld.agents

Class ActiveAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.agents.Agent
      • thiefworld.agents.ActiveAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Child, Gatherer, Hunter, Protector, Thief

    public abstract class ActiveAgent
extends Agent
    The abstraction of an active agent that has the ability of switching between different roles within the environment.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea, Kees van Gelder, Daniel Karavolos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • followPheromoneTrail

        protected void followPheromoneTrail(ThiefWorld world,
                        sim.util.Bag pheromones)
        Follows a pheromone trail specified by a collection of pheromones. The agent will make a step toward the averaged normalized vector for each pheromone and will also take into account a random movement.
        Parameters:
        world - the ThiefWorld reference.
        pheromones - the collection of pheromones which the agent should follow.

      • getHealth

        public double getHealth()
        Retrieves the health level of the agent (normalized).
        Returns:
        the current health level.

      • goAfterFood

        protected void goAfterFood(ThiefWorld world,
               java.lang.Class<?> foodType)
        Tries to find and extract food from food sources within the agent's range.
        Parameters:
        world - the ThiefWorld reference.
        foodType - the type of food which the agent searches for.

      • increaseCarriedFruit

        public void increaseCarriedFruit(double amount)
        Increases the amount of carried fruit by the specified amount. The agent will pick up ONLY the maximum allowed amount as specified in the InventoryData.getMaxAllowedFood().
        Parameters:
        amount - the fruit amount that the agent wants to carry.

      • increaseCarriedMeat

        public void increaseCarriedMeat(double amount)
        Increases the amount of carried meat by the specified amount. The agent will pick up ONLY the maximum allowed amount as specified in the InventoryData.getMaxAllowedFood().
        Parameters:
        amount - the meat amount that the agent wants to carry.

      • increaseSkill

        protected void increaseSkill()
        Increases the skill level of the agent depending on its current role.

      • isReturningFood

        public boolean isReturningFood()
        Checks to see if the agent has gathered the maximum allowed food and should thus is on its way back to the nest to drop off the carried food.
        Returns:
        true if the agent cannot carry any more food, false otherwise.

      • morph

        protected ActiveAgent morph(java.lang.Class<?> newAgentType)
        Transforms the current agent into another agent.
        Parameters:
        newAgentType - the new agent type.
        Returns:
        the morphed agent.

      • replace

        protected ActiveAgent replace(ThiefWorld world,
                  java.lang.Class<?> newAgentType)
        Morphs the current agent into a new type of agent and replaces the current agent with it on both the map and the world scheduler.
        Parameters:
        world - the ThiefWorld reference.

        Returns:
        the morphed agent
